divs: Sighting DetailsI witnessed a disked shaped UFO over Newtonsville Ohio during the summer of 1985. The skies were clear of clouds. The craft glowed a orange-yellow. The underside of the craft appeared to be charred like that of a space capsule. The craft flew completely silent about 100-200 feet in the sky. I estimate the craft was 1000 feet from me and about 30'-40' in diameter. The event only lasted about 2 minutes from the time it dropped from the sky. I had just finished mowing the grass at the church on 131 near Newtonsville. I felt started when I saw it.
Summary: Witnessed a disked shaped UFO over Newtonsville Ohio
